title: Get Ready to Profit From the ‘Biden Boom'
text: Joe Biden has big plans for clean energy during his presidency. And 2021 could be the year that a massive infrastructure/clean energy bill is passed.

title: Stocks could see all-time highs before year-end, top strategist says. How he'd play it
text: The S&P 500 could hit 3,800 by the end of this year and 4,200 by the end of 2021, says Phil Orlando of Federated Hermes.

title: 2021 U.S. Outlook: The Recovery Takes Hold
text: As we say good riddance to 2020, we enter 2021 with a confidence that new market and business cycles have arisen. We believe the economy, out of the depths of the COVID-induced recession, has entered what will be a protracted recovery, complete with the inevitable fits and starts, as experienced at the end of 2020.

title: Dow Jones, S&P 500, and Nasdaq weakened on a weekly basis as uncertainty over fresh economic stimulus dented confidence
text: The U.S. stock indices have weakened on a weekly basis as uncertainty over fresh economic stimulus dented confidence. The U.S. surpassed the 16 million coronavirus cases on Saturday, and the U.S. Congress can't agree on a stimulus deal as regional lockdowns come into place.

title: ECB Review: Loose Yield Curve Control
text: The December 2020 meeting of the European Central Bank focused once again on asset purchases and generous liquidity provisions to the financial sector instead of lowering policy rates further, in line with our longstanding view that the ECB is near the effective lower bound on the deposit facility rate. The ECB unveiled a package of monetary policy measures broadly in line with market expectations.

title: Healthcare Stocks Join Buffett's Trove For December

title: Rotation The Theme For Next Year
text: Vaccines will be a game-changer for the pandemic and financial markets. 2021 might actually be calm, a vast change from what we have seen this year in the markets. Equity markets are likely to be well-supported by central bank policies and the dearth of risk events on the near horizon, but the theme for 2021 may be rotation.

text: Last week's stampede into IPO's shocked many veteran analysts as the two companies had one surprising fact in common. The Viper Report's Tom Aspray examines the action and what it may mean for future stock prices.

text: BlackRock is the world's biggest asset manager, with over $7 trillion in assets, and something big just happened in regards to its climate change influence.

title: These 5 surprises could jolt stocks and lead to a surge in volatility next year, BofA says
text: With books nearly closed on 2020, investors and strategists are beginning to turn their attention towards what might be in store for the stock market in 2021. Whether next year will be as strong for the stock market as 2020, despite a global pandemic that shuttered businesses and economies around the globe, is anyone's best guess.

title: Irrational Exuberance - The Bulls Remain In Control

title: Here Are the 4 Biggest Consumer Trends to Look For in 2021
text: Technological advancements and a COVID-driven mental reset are prompting big changes in how customers are making purchasing decisions.

title: "We're Not Going Back," Says Fed Chair: What Investors Should Know About an Economy Forever Changed
text: The pandemic has accelerated existing trends in e-commerce, AI, robotics, and big data. Investors should understand how this can impact their stock portfolios moving forward.

title: U.S. airlines drop 36,700 jobs after CARES Act ends
text: U.S. scheduled passenger airlines employed 9.1 percent fewer full-time equivalents  in mid-October 2020 than a month earlier, according to the Bureau of Transportation Statistics. Mid-October's total number of FTEs (368,162) was down 36,707 from mid-September 2020 (404,869 FTEs) and 91,871 from mid-March 2020.

title: Weighing The Week Ahead: How Should Investors Cope With Washington Gridlock?
text: The economic calendar is normal, with an emphasis on housing data and retail sales. Economic developments still do not seem important to short-term market moves. The exciting news is the development and distribution of a COVID-19 vaccine. The progress so far is a great milestone.
